Name: zomboDRIVE: Apocalyptic Road Trip
About the game: Get in the car and go on a dangerous adventure in the post-apocalyptic world. <- Best description ever FEATURES - Cars for driving: little, Medium and BIG - Explore random generated world with different bioms (they will still repeat, haha) - Beware of radiation zones (oh those CLICKS...........................................) - Protect yourself from ZOMBIES (little secret: they are very afraid of flying pans) - Real-time day to night cycle and many weathers (our artist said that this is a killer feature) - Online radio in your car! - EXPLOSION IN MAIN MENU!!! - And you can collect a collection of bugs! (really, it's early access though)
